description: Rarely available upscale end-unit (only 1 neighbour!) townhome built by award-winning builder Didyk in a gated, pet-friendly family complex! Bright 3-bed, 2.5-bath home on 2 storeys featuring open-concept main floor, stone accent fireplace, s/s appliances, generous bedrooms (master w/ ensuite & large walk-in closet), double garage, huge crawlspace for storage & a fenced landscaped yard. Only 24 units in the complex - a great little community - with RV parking, kids' playground, clubhouse, visitor parking, and convenient to all amenities, shopping, schools, highways, downtown Mission & the West Coast Express commuter train.
